sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCIRPUS, in botany: A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the triandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 3d order, Calamariae. The glumes are paleaceous, and imbricated all round. There is no corolla; and only one beardleſs ſeed.
